name: Security Forces
background: The Gangs of New Eden are various factions of violent and deranged outlaws that wage eternal gang wars on the streets of New Eden. These gangs are joined by mercenaries which are not bound to any particular gang, and which fight for anyone that can provide riches or a worthy cause.

options.label: Heavy Pistol (12", A1, AP(1)), Combat Shield (Bash (A1), Shielded)

gains.name: Master Sniper Rifle
gains.label: Master Sniper Rifle (30", A2, AP(1), Reliable)

options.label: Master Sniper Rifle (30", A2, AP(1), Reliable)

sections.label: Take one Master Heavy Rifle attachment

options.label: Heavy Pistol (12", A1, AP(1)), Hand Weapon (A2)
Twin Heavy Pistol (12", A2, AP(1)), Knife (A1)

options.label: Heavy Flamer (12", A1, AP(1), Blast(3), Reliable)

spells.name: Targeting Signal
spells.effect: Pick up to two friendly units within 12", which get Relentless once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Stinger Blast
spells.effect: Pick one enemy unit within 18", which takes 1 hit with Smash.

spells.name: Absorption Amplifier
spells.effect: Pick up to four friendly units within 12", which get Ballistic Vest Boost once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Choking Gas
spells.effect: Pick up to two enemy units within 6", which take 3 hits with Bane each.

spells.name: Assign Bounty
spells.effect: Pick up to six enemy units within 18", which friendly units gets Impact(1) against once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (this._skirmish ? 1 : this.AuraSize), avgUnit: true }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Taser Shock
spells.effect: Pick up to three enemy units within 12", which take 2 hits with AP(2) each.

specialRules.name: Piercing Target
specialRules.description: Once per game, during this model's activation, pick one enemy unit within 36" and in line of sight of it, and place X markers on it. Friendly units get +AP(X) when attacking it.

specialRules.name: Melee Shrouding Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Melee Shrouding. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Repel Ambushers
specialRules.description: Enemy units using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model's unit.

specialRules.name: Shielded
specialRules.description: Units where all models have this rule get +1 to defense rolls against hits that are not from spells.

specialRules.name: Ranged Slayer Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Ranged Slayer. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Ballistic Vest
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule are shot or charged from over 9" away and take hits, those hits count as having AP(-1), to a min. of AP(0).

specialRules.name: Ballistic Vest Boost Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Ballistic Vest Boost. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Flying Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Flying. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Furious Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Furious. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Surge
specialRules.description: On unmodified results of 6 to hit, this weapon deals 1 extra hits (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Smash
specialRules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and against units where most models have Defense 5+ to Defense 6+, this weapon gets Blast(+3).

specialRules.name: Impact Mark
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick up to 4 enemy units within 18", which friendly units gets Impact(+1) against once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Melee Shrouding
specialRules.description: Enemies get -3" movement when trying to charge units where all models have this rule.

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9 away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush cant seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Slayer
specialRules.description: This model's weapons get AP(+2) against units where most models have Tough(3) or higher.

specialRules.name: Ranged Slayer
specialRules.description: This model's ranged weapons get AP(+2) against units where most models have Tough(3) or higher.

specialRules.name: Ballistic Vest Boost
specialRules.description: If all models in this unit have Ballistic Vest, enemy hits always count as having AP(-1) from Ballistic Vest (instead of only when being shot/charged from over 9" away).

specialRules.name: Flying
specialRules.description: May move through units and terrain, and ignores terrain effects whilst moving, and automatically passes jumping rolls.

specialRules.name: Furious
specialRules.description: When charging, unmodified results of 6 to hit in melee deal 1 extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Regeneration
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule takes wounds, roll one die for each. On a 5+ it is ignored.

specialRules.name: Ignores Regeneration
specialRules.description: This weapon ignores Regeneration.

specialRules.name: Defense
specialRules.description: This model gets +X to defense rolls.

specialRules.name: Blast
specialRules.description: Ignores cover, and after resolving other special rules, each hit is multiplied by X, where X is up to as many hits as enemy models in the target unit and within 3 of it. Hits must be split evenly between all enemy units within 3 of any model from the target (defender picks how).

specialRules.name: Impact
specialRules.description: Roll X dice when attacking after charging, unless fatigued. For each 2+ the target takes one hit.

specialRules.name: Relentless
specialRules.description: When this model shoots at enemies over 9" away, unmodified results of 6 to hit deal 1 extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Bane
specialRules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and when attacking the target must re-roll unmodified Defense results of 6.
